1977) bụ onye Rhodesian na-ese ihe, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na-egosi ihe osise Afrịka na ndụ ọdịnala Afrịka. Songo nwere nkwarụ ma bụrụ onye na-eji oche nkwagharị

Ọ nọrọ ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya na-arụ ọrụ site na Cyrene Mission School, na-emepụta nka site n'iwu nke Frank McEwen, onye mba Briten nke nyere aka guzobe ma mesịa chikwaa Rhodesian National Gallery of Art (nke bụzi National Gallery of Zimbabwe). Ọrụ mbụ nke Songo gụnyere eserese na ihe ọkpụkpụ mgbe ụfọdụ, Otú ọ dị, n'afọ ndị sochirinụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị na ọdịnala oge ochie nke ihe ọkpụkpụ nkume Shona.
N'afọ 1946, Songo bụ isi isiokwu nke ihe nkiri British Documentary nke akpọrọ "Pitaniko, ihe nkiri nke Cyrene".
N'afọ 1954, e gosipụtara Songo na magazin Time nke akpọrọ "Wonderstone Wonders".

E gosipụtara ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Songo na National Gallery of Rhodesia, Museum of Modern Art na 1968, Musée Rodin na 1971, na London's Institute of Contemporary Arts na 1972. E rekwara ọtụtụ n'ime ha na nchịkọta onwe ha na ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na England.
